about_the_game:
Welcome to "Programming Simulator," a unique programming simulation game that allows you to experience the fun and challenges of programming in a game world. Through an intuitive node connection method, you will learn and master the core concepts of programming, from simple mathematical operations to complex logical controls, ultimately creating your own game. Whether you are a programming novice or an experienced developer, this game will provide you with a brand-new programming experience.

Features

  • Intuitive node connections: Easily build program logic by dragging functional nodes, memory nodes, etc. Each node has a detailed explanation button to help you understand its function.

  • Dynamic visual effects: When nodes run, the connecting lines display different color flow effects based on data types, making the program's operation process clear at a glance. When dragging connection points, the target connection point dynamically extends a hand to interact with the currently dragged connection point, adding fun to the operation.

  • Cute interactive prompts: When dragging connection points, a cute cat pops up above all connectable nodes, playfully telling you "What I can do," making the connection process more intuitive and fun.

  • Rich task system: Start with simple tasks and gradually delve deeper, challenging your programming skills. Ultimately, you can use built-in art assets (such as graphics and animations) or import custom materials to create a unique personal game.

  • Support for custom art assets: Import graphics, animations, and other materials you create to make the game more personalized and fully express your creativity.

  • Graphic nodes: Display graphics in the result window, intuitively showcasing your creative achievements.

  • Animation nodes: Create animations in the result window to make your game more lively and interesting.

  • Support for the Workshop: Through the Workshop, you can share your game creations, download works from other players, and exchange ideas with them.

Suitable for Players

  • Beginners interested in programming: Learn the basics of programming through gamified methods, easily get started, and embark on your programming journey.

  • Those who want to learn programming fundamentals in a fun and easy way: The gamified node connections and task system make learning programming simple, understandable, and full of fun.

  • Those who wish to cultivate logical thinking and interest in programming: Start with simple tasks and gradually delve deeper to help you easily get into programming and mathematical logic.

  • Those who want to enhance their thinking abilities while having fun: By completing programming tasks and creating games, you can exercise logical thinking and problem-solving skills while gaining a sense of achievement.

  • Those who enjoy hands-on creation and personalized expression: Support for importing custom art assets, combined with graphic nodes and animation nodes, allows you to create unique game works and showcase your creative talent.

  • Those who love programming and enjoy the joy of creation: Challenge your programming skills in the game world, experience the creative process from scratch, and feel the charm of programming.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590@3.00GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760(2GB) / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In the game, you are a game programmer writing game code as assigned by your company. But don't worry, you can build a game just by dragging and dropping nodes and connecting them! With this game you will experience the process of game development and improve your logical thinking.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
